xwikidoc.content:
# Class fields ### Missing: Menu.MenuClass_content1=Menu Structure
# Live table generic keys menu.livetable.doc.title=页面标题 menu.livetable.doc.name=页面名称 menu.livetable.doc.location=位置 menu.livetable.doc.space=空间 menu.livetable.doc.fullname=页面全名 menu.livetable.doc.author=最后作者 menu.livetable.doc.creator=创建人 menu.livetable.doc.date=更新日期 menu.livetable.doc.creationDate=创建日期 menu.livetable._avatar=头像 menu.livetable._images=图片 menu.livetable._attachments=附件 ### Missing: menu.livetable._actions=Actions menu.livetable._actions.edit=编辑 menu.livetable._actions.delete=删除 menu.livetable.emptyvalue=-
# Live table specific keys menu.livetable.content1=菜单结构
# Administration keys admin.menu.name=菜单
# UIX keys menu.uix.extensionPoint.label=菜单显示位置 menu.uix.extensionPoint.hint=指定显示菜单的位置。根据所选位置，水平或垂直显示菜单。 ### Missing: menu.uix.extensionPoint.value.nowhere=Nowhere ### Missing: menu.uix.extensionPoint.value.template.header.after=After the Page Header ### Missing: menu.uix.extensionPoint.value.panels.rightPanels=Inside a Right Panel ### Missing: menu.uix.extensionPoint.value.panels.leftPanels=Inside a Left Panel ### Missing: menu.uix.content.label=UI Extension Content ### Missing: menu.uix.content.hint=If you can see this then it probably means you have JavaScript disabled. You should select the same value as for the menu display location. ### Missing: menu.uix.scope.label=Menu Visibility Scope ### Missing: menu.uix.scope.hint=Specifies in which context the menu is visible.
# Menu Macro ### Missing: rendering.macro.menu.name=Menu ### Missing: rendering.macro.menu.description=Displays a menu created using simple wiki syntax (nested lists and links). ### Missing: rendering.macro.menu.parameter.id.name=Id ### Missing: rendering.macro.menu.parameter.id.description=Optional menu identifier that will be set on the HTML element that wraps the menu. You can use this identifier in JavaScript code to access the menu DOM or in functional tests to assert the menu items. ### Missing: rendering.macro.menu.parameter.type.name=Type ### Missing: rendering.macro.menu.parameter.type.description=The optional menu type determines the menu appearance and behaviour. The supported values are: horizontal (default value) and vertical. ### Missing: rendering.macro.menu.content.description=Define the menu structure using wiki syntax. Each menu item should be a list item and should contain the menu item label or link. You can use nested lists for sub-menu items.
# Menu WebHome ### Missing: menu.description=This is a simple application that helps you create navigation menus to be displayed either horizontally as a top bar after the page header or vertically in a side panel.
